name: Torres Dillard
review: I had a bad cavity which was really painful. And I was suffering for a long time. Tried out a dentist before but the experience wasn't good. Then I came to know about Mr. Fibonacci. This awesome doctor. I would say we all should take care of our tooth. Mr. Fibonacci is my go to dentist now.

name: Graham Nielsen
review: He is the best dentist I have ever consulted. His way to treating is awesome. He took his time and checked everything out and solved my issue just like magic. I definitely recommand him.

name: Rios Mcconnell
review: I had a major surgery last month. And he did really well. I hardly felt any pain. The environment was super. And I must say he knows his craft. Before the surgery I was worried about it. Some of my friends has bad experiences with dental surgery. I was really nervous. But Mr. Fibonacci cheered me up and the surgery was successfull.
